grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 汗【カン】khan (medieval ruler of a Tatary tribe)
成吉思汗【ジンギスカン】Japanese mutton and vegetable dish, slotted dome cast iron grill for preparing this dish
大汗【タイカン】Great Khan, Grand Khan
kun reading compounds: 汗だく【あせだく】dripping with sweat, bathed in perspiration
